note.p: Breeder of shorthorn cattle. With his brother Amos (1808–95) of Sittyton Farm, Aberdeenshire, developed a type of cattle that dominated both British and North American herds by the latter half of the century.
UK and Ireland, Find a grave index, 1300s–current (Ancestrylibraryedition.co.uk, accessed 11 December 2019)
